body:
i'm got same issue too.

- parse the `aa.key` is ok
```bash
openssl genrsa -passout pass:pwdstr -aes256 -out aa.key 2048
```

- but the `bb.key` fails
```bash
openssl req -x509 -days 365 -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout bb.key -passout pass:pwdstr -out bb.crt -subj "/C=CN"
```

> Error message:  
asn1: structure error: tags don't match (2 vs {class:0 tag:16 length:64 isCompound:true}) {optional:false explicit:false application:false defaultValue:<nil> tag:<nil> stringType:0 timeType:0 set:false omitEmpty:false} int @2
